scripts.build-net5: gulp static-assets && gulp server-build && gulp wasm-build && gulp warnings
scripts.build-net6: gulp server-build --option net6 && gulp wasm-build --option net6
scripts.publish-net5: gulp publish --option server && gulp publish --option wasm
scripts.publish-net6: gulp publish --option server-net6 && gulp publish --option wasm-net6
